name: Blocks (itch) (Aakil Ahamed)
description:
Surf through the endless valley of blocks 

and

 PASS YOUR TIME!!!

Arrow keys or WASD or mobile controls to move. 

If a level is impossible or too difficult, press 's' to skip.

 Press 'r' to restart.

 Avoid spikes and bounce on springs :) 

Press space to switch the backdrop

post your highscore in the comment secton your name will be included in the top 10 highscorers section in this page
